评论概述: Perfect for any Shinobi! Can't beat the price for the quality!
评论详情: Pics reference how short I am, and I struggle to find sweats that fit being only 5ft 2 but these are great!  Love these, I've been looking for some good cargo sweats for a more modern Hatake Kakashi cosplay, and these pants are perfect for that Shinobi look, and even better, I can wear them for everyday life as well! SIX POCKETS + SWEAT PANTS + STRAPS = HAPPY SHINOBI  Quality of the stitching seems great, fabric is super nice, LOVE the zippers on the front hip pockets! I'm short so I'll have to hem the legs a bit but that's not uncommon for me. I'm able to comfortably do splits and squats in them, fabric is very nice with its level of stretch. Thick enough to be comfy in the upcoming winter but not so thick they're uncomfortable in the dog days of summer. I wear a 32 and I used the chart to get my size and they're a perfect fit. I look forward to wearing these for a long while!

I love these pants when I got them I sported them well and then I washed them like normal clothes without reading the label. You must hang dry these. If you put it in a dryer the synthetic material that's involved in these pants will react and ball up. If you notice the picture that is not lent that is the actual pant material. It was user error and not quality. I'm so sorry I did this to myself.
Straps broke after one wash. Doesn't feel durable enough to wear more than a few times. Lots of pockets and super light weight. Not worth the price in my opinion.
Quality on these are great and very comfortable!
I bought These pants for my 11 year-old grandson and he loves them. They are very unique and no one at school will have any like them. I’m sure.
Really comfortable, the stretch allows for up to 40" waist to fit well. Looks like the pictures. Only issue is the zippers are kinda hard to move. All in all I recommend for the price

The quality is great. My son is 6' 170lbs I usually buy him size L but I bought XL because these companies run a little short and smaller. The XL fit perfect.  I am afraid to put them in the dryer and will dry on a rack to be safe. He loves them. The material is nice, heavy. Definitely worth the price. The kids love techwear clothing and these are perfect. The straps on the legs aren't too much like some of the techwear clothing.  No regrets buying from this company. All their clothing items are great quality and look great too.

评论概述: Do NOT listen to the reviews about size!

The zip up pockets are huge and I can zip them up with my whole phone comfortably in my pocket. I love them!

I love these pants!! I wasn’t sure about the size based on other reviews, but I like what I got. I am 5’1, 115lbs so I ordered a Medium and it fits well. Waist is perfect. 评论概述: Good value but could be improved
评论详情: The style of these pants is good, I ordered an XXL for the baggier look but I could've gone another size up even. I'm 5'9 186 lbs. I don't really like the material though, it's that weird kind of polyester that is soft but itchy at the same time. It's really thick though and I think the durability will be good. Also, it unnecessarily says "sacramento" on both pockets lmao. I might try to cover those because it's silly af *insert random English word*. I also wish the straps were longer. Overall good value though as I got them on sale.

评论概述: Good quality fabric, but poorly sewn.
评论详情: The second time I wore these out, the buckle on the left pocket popped off. I was able to resow it myself rather easily, but the fact that I can do a better job sewing on the buckles than the people who made this product is a bad sign. Don't buy these unless you have a sewing kit and feel like reinforcing the buckles yourself.

These pants are super comfortable and flexible too. You could use these for not only fashion but also wear it to the gym. I’m 5’5 180lbs with thick thighs and calfs and it hugs them a bit, like how some joggers do. So if you want that baggy feel, go 1 size up! Overall, I love these pants
